custom_nodes.author: lex-drl
custom_nodes.title: String Constructor (Text-Formatting)
custom_nodes.description:
Composing prompt variants from the same text pieces with ease:
‚Ä¢ Build your "library" (dictionary) of named text chunks (sub-strings) to use it across the entire workflow.
‚Ä¢ Compile these snippets into different prompts in-place - with just one string formatting node.
‚Ä¢ Freely update the dictionary down the line - get different prompts.
‚Ä¢ Reference text chunks within each other to build dependent hierarchies of less/more detailed descriptions.
‚Ä¢ A real life-saver for regional prompting (aka area composition).
